text: Steven-Andreas Benda is a German professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Welsh club Swansea City. ==Career== Born in Stuttgart, Benda spent his early career with 1. FC Heidenheim and TSV 1860 Munich. He signed for Swansea City in August 2017 and signed a new three-year contract in June 2019. He joined the Swansea first-team in the 2018–19 season following an injury to Erwin Mulder. He moved on loan to Swindon Town in September 2019. He made his senior debut on 8 October 2019, in the EFL Trophy, and made his Football League debut on 12 October. ==Honours== Swindon Town *EFL League Two: 2019–20 ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:German footballers Category:1. title: Steven Benda
